TopicTitle: Make the fire in KSP2 better

Articles.Content: Not gonna lie, the fire animation for reentry is better in the first game than the second. Could you please make it better? Also I really want colonies.

On 3/20/2024 at 2:25 AM, Fearless Flier said:

Not gonna lie, the fire animation for reentry is better in the first game than the second. Could you please make it better?

Perhaps you can explain what's wrong with KSP 2's effect and why KSP 1's effect looks better

I kind of agree. While 2's effects look much higher quality, with more polish, the way you can see the vessel through the plasma makes it look much less intense. On the other hand, 1's effects like much more rough and janky, but they convey the intensity of re entry better. I think the transparency through the plasma really takes away from the effect.
